newsitem.title: FRANCE: Lufthansa Lyon-Munich offers express service.
newsitem.headline: Lufthansa Lyon-Munich offers express service.

text.p: Lufthansa said it was looking to develop traffic for low-volume express shipments on a passenger service between Lyon and Munich starting on September 16.
The service will operate to a three-times daily frequency using limited cargo capacity Canadair aircraft, a Paris-based Lufthansa Cargo official told Reuters.
"While clearly the priority is to generate passenger traffic on the route, we do see a market for documents and small parcels between Lyon and Munich," the official said.

Shippers in the Lyon region, France's second industrial conurbation after Paris, will be able to use the morning, afternoon and evening flights for shipments to the Munich hub from where Lufthansa operates flights to the Far East, the U.S and eastern Europe, the official added. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+44 171 542 5017
